Sept. 10, 1904 D Llanelly Contest (Class A)
Llanelly Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Llanelly Contest llanelly-contest-class-a

Donizetti [arr. Round]
Parc Howard, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best cornet, horn and trombone - Cwmtawe. Best euphonium - Protheroe's. March contest - 1st Cwmtawe. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 3, 2018, 3:29 p.m. Sept. 3, 2018, 3:36 p.m.

2 Tycroes Silver D. Williams
3 Protheroe's Silver Thomas Proctor
